mapper.select: SELECT no,title,member_id,writer,content,writeDate,viewCount,ref, restep,relevel,total FROM( SELECT no,title,member_id,writer,content,writeDate,viewCount, CEIL(rownum/5) AS page,ref,restep,relevel,total FROM ( SELECT no,title,member_id,writer,content,viewCount, to_char(writeDate,'YYYY.MM.DD') as writeDate, ref,restep,relevel,total FROM qnaboard order by ref desc,restep asc ) ) WHERE PAGE=#{value}
select no,title,member_id,writer,content,viewCount, to_char(writeDate,'YYYY.MM.DD') as writeDate, ref,restep,relevel from qnaboard where no=#{value}
select cno,no,member_name,replyComment,to_char(commentDate,'YYYY.MM.DD') as commentDate,member_id from QnAcomment where no=#{value} order by cno asc
mapper.update: update qnaboard set viewCount=viewCount+1 where no=#{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT qna_seq.nextval from dual
insert into qnaboard (no,title,member_id,writer,content,writeDate,viewCount,ref,restep,relevel) values (#{no},#{title},#{member_id},#{writer},#{content},SYSDATE,0,#{no},0,0)
mapper.update: update qnaboard set title=#{title},content=#{content} where no=#{no}
UPDATE qnaboard SET restep = restep+1 WHERE ref=#{ref} AND restep > #{restep}

insert into QnAcomment(cno, no, member_name, replyComment, commentDate,member_id) values(qnacomment_seq.nextval,#{no},#{member_name},#{replyComment},SYSDATE,#{member_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE qnaboard SET total = total+1 WHERE no=#{value}
